featured.text: Visitors now can drive over sections of the park that previously took days of horseback riding to see.
After 11 years of work, the final section of the road was completed in 1932.

It will be made of timber as an ecological symbol of “the right to a dignified life on a protected Earth,” said architects Normier, Henni and Lelievre, who were also responsible for the Europe section at the Seville exhibition.

definition.en_def: A distinct part or subdivision of something.
definition.example: Please read the first section of the report.
